com.radirius.merc.fmwk

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.fmwk.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that will run your core, and give out the graphics object, current core, resource manager, and input ly.
    Author:
    wessles
